answers.answer: Is ur blood pressure ok?
U may have a higher chance of developing diabetes and high blood pressure have u ask ur dr

I'm 21 weeks and I've gained 15 lbs. But its crazy because its not noticeable at all. Ppl can't even tell I'm pregnant most the time. You could just be bloated. Just make sure you eat the right things and drink a lot of water. Even tho I feel guilty giving that advice bc I definitely don't eat right :/

My doctor said everything looks great my blood pressure is fine and all the blood work I have had done has come back normaI drink a lot of water and I have been taking prenatals and I think for the most part I eat health. And people have been able to tell I was praganent since I was 5 weeks.
Are you eating much carbs like pasta, rice,bread, crackers? Fried foods? Maybe atibg to much sodium/salt? Ask your doctor to make you a gestational diabetes test to rule that out.

I know how you feel. I gained a lot a weight inthe beginning also. I'm 38+2 now and have gained 65lbs nothing to worry about iI don't think. Everyone is just different. I also eat healthy and drink lots of water

I eat a lot of fruit and broccoli lol because I was so sick I have tried to stay away from a lot of fried foods and stuff. I was 125lbs before I got praganent and I pretty much eat the same way I did then. I have been told that they won't test me for diabetes until I am further along or can I request it now?
Im 18w3d and ive gained 6 pounds
Woow that's a lot of weight..
Klou91 have you had any problems with your pregnancy or has your doctor been worried that you will have trouble?
I am 20 weeks and have only gained 3 lbs. And my doctor says thats perfectly normal that I will start gaining more now bc of the baby growing
I'm 19wks and have gained 4pounds so far

Don't worry!!! Is it a boy?? I gained weight like that too I even swelled up like a balloon by the time my son was ready I was just huge but lost most of it right after. The doctors could never find anything wrong. And now this pregnancy I'm barely gaining at all..sounds like your a ftm just be happy and who cares about weight just stay healthy and you and your baby will be fine is how I see it. Good luck
We find out on the 6th if it's a boy or girl :) and thank you I have been worried something might be wrong with the baby or something it helps knowing I'm not the only one to gain so much weight

I don't feel so bad now lol. I'm 23wks+6days & I've gained 21 pounds so far. Before I got pregnant I was only 84 pounds.. my baby app says I'm overweight but I really just think my daughter is really healthy
I'm 18 weeks with a boy and have gained 5 pounds

No I have no problems and yeah it is a lot of weight thanks for pointing that out. Don't be rude. My doctor says everything is fine I have a lot of water weight but everything will be normal again when she Is born.

I'm 26 pounds and 29 weeks tommorrrow. I gained ten pounds out of no were the last 6 weeks. Unless it was supported sudden I wouldn't be to concerned. My blood pressure is perfect and slightly on the low side. No protein in urine. Glucose levels are good. I just have been stress eating. lol
Lol everyone is different as long as the baby is healthy right I knew my cousin gained 85lbs and two weeks later could barley tell she had a baby

First of all.. don't be in my messages with this bull.. Who said I was being negative or even talking to you... If I @ your name I'm talking about... congratulations to all of the nice people on this post. @klou91 as for you don't come for me again.

question: I am a ftm and Im 18 weeks and I have already gained 20lbs. I'm not sure why I have gained so much because up until 2 weeks ago I pretty much throw up anything I would eat I can't stand anything with a lot of sugar and I don't drink soda. Everything I have read and the people I have talked to say I'm gaining to much weight. Is there any one else that is like this and should I be worried?
title: 18 weeks and have gained 20lbs
